page.title: 10Changing Times
page.content: The most important feature of our study block is{the renewal of Swansea {City centre and foreshore. Two important happenings created the situation where a lot of new buildings were needed. These events were the {decline of the old industries}and the damage done by{the blitz in 1941 during the war. Although these events happened a long time ago, it is only now that we can see the results of urban renewal. Some of the developments include the Quadrant centre, St. Davids centre, the leisure centre and the Marina. These modern buildings help to give this area of Swansea a cleaner and more spacious appearance although{many {older people think that Swansea has {lost its character.
